name: One more metroidvania
description: A very bad dracula (very very bad) hide in his castle. You are a very kind vampire, you know how to use blood as a weapon and want to kill a dracula (because he is bad). Unfortunately, there is no Dracula in the castle (there was not enough budget). Kill his main assistants, huge goblins who hide behind the doors Rose, Shield and Moon. Once all the goblins are dead, you will win. If you died, don’t worry, because now you can spend the money you earn on improvements and return even stronger than before.
